body: Omnipay is not yet compatible with Symfony 3 or Laravel 5.2 because of the dependency on Guzzle 3. Work is progressing on an Omnipay 3.0 release which will resolve that dependency. In the meantime I suggest developing your site with Laravel 5.1 which has long term support, and upgrade to laravel 5.2 later when omnipay 3 is released
title: Installing Omnipay with laravel 5.2
